sn48.59:4.2: “Mendicants, these five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated except when a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha has appeared.
sn48.59:4.4: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.59:4.5: These five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated except when a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha has appeared.”
